nodes.text: Mal Ree Ohr was a Human female xenobiologist who served the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars on Drongar. In 20 BBY, she discovered a disease of unknown origin in one of the clone troopers, CT-914, that, fortunately, Jedi Padawan Barriss Offee could cure using Force healing. She survived the attack of the Separatist forces against the medical center, and the Republic Mobile Surgical Unit was moved to a new location. When the Republic forces discovered that the Bota had no use any more, Mal and the other personnel left Drongar.
